intro.text: At RoosterTools, we believe that the key to being more productive is having everything you need at your fingertips. Whether you are a programmer or a designer, our platform allows you to save, organize, and access your favorite resources easily without overloading your browser bookmarks.

title: Resource List
note: Note: This is a beta version. Your data will be stored locally on this browser and device, ensuring that only you can access it. The data is saved according to the previously selected language and it is not possible to change the language afterward. You can download your favorites in PDF format to access them anywhere.
